title: misc/zsh: zsh completion not compinit compatible
body:
by **petereisentraut**: 
The zsh completion in misc/zsh/go does not follow the conventions of typical zsh
completion files.  They should be named like "_go" and start with a #compdef
tag, so that they can be autoloaded when installed in the zsh function path.  Is there a
reason this is not done here?
